Description
ContextAwareDecorator
A TaskDecorator which passes thread-local attributes via RequestContextHolder.
MultipleExecutorAutoConfiguration
Auto-configuration to provide configuration-defined AsyncTaskExecutor beans.
MultipleExecutorProperties
Configuration properties to define AsyncTaskExecutor beans.
MultipleExecutorSupport
Factory methods for creating AsyncTaskExecutor beans from MultipleExecutorProperties configuration.
PoolConfig
Executor pool configuration properties, analogous to TaskExecutionProperties.Pool and using the same default values.
ShutdownConfig
Executor pool shutdown configuration, analogous to TaskExecutionProperties.Shutdown and using the same default values.
